H0.text: Acmeism relates to poetry from the early 20th Century in which country. France

H1.text: Acmeism relates to poetry from the early 20th Century in which country. Germany

H2.text: Acmeism relates to poetry from the early 20th Century in which country. United States

H3.text: Acmeism relates to poetry from the early 20th Century in which country. Рәсәй

A6.text: Acmeist poetry was not a French movement; it was a Russian modernist school.

A10.text: The early 20th‑century Russian poetry scene included poets such as Alexander Blok, Anna Akhmatova, Boris Pasternak, Vladimir Mayakovsky, Sergei Yesenin, and Konstantin Balmont.
